name: A Pluck Of Many
description: Summons a group of duplicates that attack alongside the player. These clones can distract enemies but are relatively fragile.
notes: Receive from the Headless Monk after reaching the Windseal Gate towards the end of Chapter 2.

name: Cloud Step
description: Transforms the player into an invisible mist, leaving a decoy behind. Allows for repositioning and can be followed by an 'Unveiling Strike' to stagger enemies.
notes: Defeat the Black Wind King in the Black Wind Cave Interior towards the end of Chapter 1.

name: Immobilize
description: Freezes a target enemy in place, canceling their attacks. The duration is shorter for tougher enemies.
notes: Automatically obtained during the fight against the Bullguard in Chapter 1.

name: Life-Saving Strand
description: Automatically triggers to save the player's life once every 10 minutes by creating a clone that takes a fatal blow, restoring the player to full health.
notes: Available only in New Game Plus; received upon interacting with the first Keeper Shrine in the new playthrough.

name: Ring Of Fire
description: Creates a ring of fire on the ground, repelling weaker enemies while accelerating stamina recovery and enhancing the effectiveness of consumables.
notes: Defeat the Macaque Chief for the second time shortly after reaching the Warding Temple shrine in Chapter 3.

name: Rock Solid
description: Turns the player's body to stone, granting a brief moment of invincibility and parrying incoming attacks if timed correctly, which can stagger opponents.
notes: Defeat the Tiger Vanguard at the Crouching Tiger Temple in Chapter 2.

name: Spell Binder
description: Disables the use of spells, transformations, and soul skills but significantly enhances weapon and melee damage.
notes: Complete the Treasure Hunter quest in Chapter 3, which culminates in defeating the Green-Capped Martialist.
